Comfort and Quality is Our Priority

For over 38 years we are dedicated to providing the best experience for our customers when using all of our products.

History of Furnique

Furnique was founded in 1985 by a group of passionate furniture makers who were tired of the low-quality and mass-produced furniture that dominated the market. They believed that furniture should be both beautiful and functional, and that it should last a lifetime.

Our Team

Our team of expert designers and furniture makers work tirelessly to craft pieces that are not only visually appealing but also practical and durable. We use only the highest-quality materials and pay attention to every detail, ensuring that our furniture stands the test of time and enhances the beauty of your home.

Furnique

Furnix is a furniture store that offers a wide selection of high-quality, stylish pieces for every room in the home. From modern and contemporary to traditional and classic, Furnix has something for every design preference.
